summary: This is an email chain from August 2019 regarding coordination for a call concerning Jeffrey Epstein. It involves FBI personnel from the New York Field Office and CID, discussing who should be included on the call.

events.title: Coordination for Epstein-related call
events.description: FBI personnel exchange emails to finalize the list of participants for a call regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is an internal FBI email chain dated August 25-26, 2019.
The subject is coordinating participants for a call concerning Jeffrey Epstein.
The email involves personnel from the FBI's New York Field Office and CID (Criminal Investigative Division).
All names of individuals are redacted in the provided text, indicated by apostrophes or initials like 'ASAC VC/VCAC'.
The document shows ongoing FBI coordination regarding the Epstein case shortly after his death in August 2019.
